title: Exquisite Navratna Kundan Haaram with Sky Blue Drops
materials: Sky Blue Chalcedony drops. Features intricate Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant luster.
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases traditional Kundan craftsmanship with an elaborate floral design. The setting is meticulously handcrafted, creating a seamless blend of stones and gold. Emeralds are strategically placed for auspiciousness (Navratna concept), complemented by delicate pink sapphire floral accents and smooth sky-blue chalcedony drops that add a touch of modern elegance. The central pendant features a cascading design with matching gemstones.
colors: Pink. The combination creates a vibrant and auspicious palette
occasions: and other grand celebrations. It's a statement piece ideal for making a lasting impression at any significant event.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The Kundan setting, coupled with the auspicious Navratna arrangement, makes it a timeless heirloom piece. The high-quality gemstones and expert Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and value. The combination of vibrant colors and intricate details makes it a true work of art.
